summary.problem: User inquires about availability of daily water level data for the Amazon River, expecting daily frequency instead of less frequent updates.
summary.solution: Daily water level data for the Amazon River is available internally under the path: Weather > Brazil > Amazon River Level (Internal). It can be accessed via the dashboard URL pattern: https://dnexr.dnext.io/dashboard/*/Weather/Brazil/[unique-identifier]. This dataset provides daily measurements for internal use.
